about_the_game:
The spotlight shines once again on Sixtar Gate, introducing STARGAZER, a vibrant blend of rhythm action and engaging storytelling!

Adventure Mode

Step into the shoes of the Captain (the protagonist) as you team up with the free-spirited guitarist Dorimi (voiced by Eunjo Lee and Kanako Nomura). Together, uncover a brand-new story set in the Sixtar Gate universe.

Immersive Rhythm Gameplay

  • 4-Lane System: Perfect for rhythm game newcomers, this intuitive layout ensures a smooth and satisfying experience.

  • Voltage Overdrive System: Rack up combo chains to supercharge your score and achieve record-breaking performances.

Massive Song Library

Enjoy over 40 original tracks reimagined in band style, featuring beloved Sixtar Gate songs and new favorites. Stay tuned for free and paid DLC updates, promising fresh content and challenges to keep the beat alive.

Earn, Unlock, Play

Collect in-game currency, Volts, through gameplay and unlock new tracks to expand your playlist.

Features

  • Over 40 tracks with additional DLC updates planned.

  • Unique Voltage Overdrive system for high-scoring combos.

  • Intuitive 4-lane rhythm mechanics tailored for accessibility and fun.

  • Engaging Adventure Mode with a heartfelt story.

Let the rhythm guide you as you embark on the ultimate musical adventure in Sixtar Gate: STARGAZER!

name: Sixtar Gate: STARGAZER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 | AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 320, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 6670, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9400 | AMD Phenom II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9800 GTX, 512 MB | AMD Radeon HD 4870, 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Sixtar Gate: STARGAZER is the exciting spinoff to the beloved rhythm game Sixtar Gate: Startrail. Play reimagined band-style versions of original tracks, explore a new story in Adventure Mode, and enjoy intuitive 4-lane rhythm gameplay perfect for beginners and veterans alike.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
